channel.title: jMock News
channel.description: jMock is a lightweight mock object testing library for Java.

item.title: jMock 2.1.0-RC2
item.xhtml:div: JMock 2.1.0-RC2 has been released, which fixes a bug that stopped jMock mocking package-protected types.

item.title: jMock 2.1.0-RC1
item.xhtml:div: JMock 2.1.0-RC1 has been released. This version extends jMock 2.0.0 with the ability to mock abstract and concrete classes to aid in working with legacy code. In all other respects it is the same as version 2.0.0.

item.title: jMock 2.0.0
item.xhtml:div: JMock 2.0.0 has been released. Version two brings many improvements over version one, including a more convenient and readable API, better support for refactoring IDEs and support for multiple test frameworks.

item.title: jMock 1.2.0
item.xhtml:div: JMock 1.2.0 has been released. This release fixes several bugs and adds a few incremental API improvements to jMock 1.1.0.

item.title: jMock 2 Release Candidate 1
item.xhtml:div: JMock 2.0.0 RC1 has been released. Version two brings many improvements over version 1.1.0, including a more convenient and readable API, better support for refactoring IDEs and support for multiple test frameworks.
